name: Faye Ahzburjn
text: My husband has had issues with erroneous fees being taken out of his account. I introduced my husband to BBVA Compass bank because I was a satisfied long time account holder, but I've since regretted advising him, as a foreign national, to open an account there. We have made multiple visits to attempt to have correct information on his account and discuss the "extended overdraft fee" being taken from his account on the same day his paycheck is directly deposited. Chris Ballard is the one we spoke with on our last visit, Friday. We waited patiently for someone and he came in from outdoors and invited us in the office. He was shaking and trembling and seemed agitated before we even got down to business.  The meeting ended with him yelling and demanding that I be quiet and let him finish talking. At this point I had already witnessed him becoming increasingly agitated and shaking but with him becoming red in the face and yelling, we decided to leave with plans on closing both our accounts In the near future.

name: Blake Allen
text: Best bank in Alabama!

name: Drew Poole
text: A nice hometown bank in Madison. The people there make banking personal. And that's is why I continue to go there. They know and remember me. Banking isn't as cold as it is a RSFC and I can get in and out quickly. They always take them time to answer my questions with a smile and I get that down home feeling. Love these folks.

name: Sasha Walls
text: Premier Bank of the South is like banking is supposed to be. The staff are absolutely wonderful. I have both my business account and personal accounts here. I am so happy with how they conduct business.  Decisions are based on alot more than just numbers, they get to know the account holders as people.

text: Very upset. My wife and I visited this location and we used to go to this location all the time. Unfortunately this time they had the gas price at $2.88 and when my wife went to fill up the price on the pump read $2.99. This is absolutely terrible. She stopped pumping after noticing the price difference. We will not be coming back here again.

name: Jodie Plato
text: Good gas prices. Very difficult to pull in and out due to confined area. Very small corner lot that store was built on.

name: Bremda Kinnick
text: A great place for quick stops.

name: Stephen Williams
text: This place does not exist at this exact location on the map.

name: bryant vick
text: Friendly and helpful

name: Fatim Fofana
text: Thank you.

name: A Heath
text: Today I was the victim of fraud and Brittany was extremely helpful in handling all of my concerns and walking me through how to handle the situation. The staff is very friendly and kind.

name: Luke Krause
text: Very friendly staff. They know there customers.

name: Jarl Balgruuf
text: Clean, friendly staff, easy to access. They have premium fuel if you need that and great biscuits if you're looking for some breakfast!

name: Kristen Alger
text: Didn't anyone else end up with water in their tank from filling up on 4/16/21 at this station?  Circle K says they were not liable but this is where we bought gas and within an hour, our car quit working.  Mechanic found first gas sample from tank to be 70% water.  I honestly cannot come up with another possibility.

name: Brandon McGill
text: Would give zero stars if I could. Attendant decided to close at least 15 minutes early and when asked what time the close, said 10 even though it was 9:45. When I pointed out the time she just shrugged her shoulders. Thinking about pulling a “Karen” and asking to speak to the manager the next time I’m near. Will not be spending a dime in this store again.

name: Robert M.
text: Everyday something is down either the register or the gas pumps. Today I'm here at about 1030 am and the doors are locked with no sign to say why or when they are opening again. Idk who owns this place but you hired the wrong people.

name: Ebony Simon
text: Love this store

name: scott reese
text: About 2:00-2:30 a.m. stopped in for gas because it was on Gas Buddy @ $2.39. Didn't go inside. Pretty quiet at that time of morning. Almost got away! There's always 1 near by! You know what I'm talkin about! " Hey, man. How you doin? Listen, I just need...". Other than that, it was decent from outside. Inside seemed a little full/cluttered  from what I could see. Not hard gettin in or out, even if you're going to Airport Blvd.

name: Alena Tarasevich
text: Kinda small. But got great variety

name: Juanita Landers
text: Usually the best prices.

name: LaTice Scott
text: Great customer service !!!

name: zac spain
text: I have had an array of people solicit me for money here, but good gas.

name: DaJoker Gaming
text: Quick place to get stuff

name: James Perry
text: Been a member since the 70’s and have done a lot of business with them over the years. Great hometown folks who really care.

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to write this review. I'm thrilled to hear that you appreciate the great people we have on our team here at Auburn University Credit Union. We would like to express our appreciation for your membership and being a part of our financial family.

name: Tisha Lilly
text: Awesome!

resp.text: Thank you Tisha! Your awesome review is what we like to see. Let us know if you ever need anything and we will always be ready to make you proud to be an AUCU member. Have a great day!!!

name: alex harber
text:
Wouldn't even recommend for an enemy to go here it's so bad.

NEVER GO TO THIS BANK.  I have never been treated so terribly, after withdrawing money from this bank using their ATM and paying the extra charge I went to ask politely if they could break one of the 20s I withdrew so I could have smaller bills.  The clerk literally chuckled and told me no.  After this she hung up the phone/video call.
Unless you want terrible customer service and a bank clerk to figuratively spit in your face don't go here.

ABSOULTEY terrible, their service is as efficient and helpful as a football bat.

name: Courtney Williams
text: Please consider other options for your banking needs. I had an issue with a bank teller at the drive-thru with depositing  money into a checking account. I received a  receipt back for less money than deposited. I went in to file a dispute and was told an audit would be performed. I went back just over a week after not hearing anything, an was told no fault was found. This will be my last visit at this location.

name: Brittany Parham
text: Hate I chose this bank ,drive through lines are incredibly slow, when I deposited money (cash)into my account ,the receipt showed that the money wouldn't be deposited till 3 days later although it was cash, called the bank and it took several hours to resolve,tellers not friendly and awfully slow..need updated atm's where cash can possibly be deposited to save time ,spent over 24 minutes in line to deposit cash.

name: Danny Milligan
text: Got what I needed I love the dollar drinks that are even on the large drinks.

name: Julie Meskimen
text: I love the circle k. The management and team are are awesome! I'm glad to part of the team!❤️

name: Karyn Hagan
text: Always great

name: J Paul
text: Mr Anderson, I am the cashier that waited on your wife that morning. First of all, I need you to understand I wasn’t ignoring her. You forgot to mention the customer that I was talking with when you pulled up. The conversation we were having was work related, and you forgot to mention your wife waited less than a minute for me to take care of her. You also forgot to mention that your wife was trying to shut you up when you came in yelling and cursing at me. You also forgot to mention when you were cursing at me all I said to you was sir please leave the store. Not that it’s your business but I chose 3rd shift. My customers are my number one priority. I take my job very serious when it comes to my customers. I don’t like  that you’re unhappy,but I also know everyone can’t be pleased. I know you said your wife was disabled... maybe you should try getting out for her next time if 1 minute is too much time for her to be up.  You sure were able to get out to cuss me out. I don’t like that you’re unhappy with me, but I’ve done nothing wrong. Don’t know what else to say. Have a great day and “Take it easy”.

name: Ben Hutsler
text: Totally renovated. This is now a Circle K and the staff from the manager Ron to the cashiers are always friendly and have a smile. Only complaint is that they have more problems than they should with their soda machines. They are brand new but they seem to be down once a week and that is disappointing. Other than that, very happy!

resp.text: Hello Ben, thank you for your feedback and for choosing our store. We have shared your note with our management team. Thanks.

name: Audra Kennedy
text: I normally go in there several times a week. That stops today. I asked on several times for them to order my husband dip. So that they would have extra for other people. I go in there this morning to purchase four rolls of dip and there is more than enough on the shelf to have a couple cans left. Cashier refuses to sell me four rolls. She says that she needs to have them INCASE someone else wants to purchase them.   Tell me why would you refuse to sale any items in a store that is there to be sold in the first place. We have six tobacco users in my home. And three of the members are guys so they dip and smoke. I promise you that you may not miss one sale but the couple of hundreds of dollars we spend a week is gone. I was understanding the many times I have gone in and they didn’t have enough there. But I asked them to please order so many cans for my hubby and we would buy them every other week. He is a OTR driver and preferred to give his money to the town we live in

resp.text: Hi there, thank you for letting us know and we are sorry about your experience. We have passed on your message to our local management team.

name: Hayhay Moore
text: Great store always clean. The 3rd shift worker is always delightful and welcomes everyone with a smile. Mr. Anderson seems to be delusional and should probably stay away from the beer section😉

name: Nathan Anderson
text: I gave this store a 1 star rating because 1 is as low as it goes. 0 stars would be more appropriate. Me and my wife stopped at this store at 3am on Monday, July 16. All my wife wanted was a pack of cigarettes. As we pulled up to the store, we noticed that the woman working at the time was  outside smoking. My wife went inside and the clerk made no attempt to go inside and attend to the customer that just walked through the door. My wife says that this woman is always working at this time and i suppose its because management does not want her interacting with too many people. I would urge everyone to stay away from this store but if you just have to go there, dont go at 3am

resp.text: Hi Nathan, thank you for letting us know and we are sorry about your experience. We have passed on your message to our local management team. Feel free to contact us at (850) 454-1070 or via email https://www.circlek.com/contact-form.

name: Maggie Ramsey
text: There's something else about shell when I get $0.05 to a gallon because I've been with them for a while with their reward points new members get $0.25 to a gallon that's awesome

name: david groff
text: Been goin here for 10+years, I bought a single beer today and went to put it in the paper bag they gave me that had a hole in it, the beer went through it, hit the floor and busted even though it happened in front of them and in the store they wouldn’t let me exchange it even after I told them they would lose me as a customer of gas tobacco and alcohol so now on iam goin to Exxon across the road

name: That Guy
text: Decent locale but poor selection particularly in diet drinks

name: MP Parker
text: Great

name: Lucretia McCarter
text: Good gas prices

name: Anthony Farmer (BOSSLIME22)
text: Their gas is too expensive and the products they sell in the store is too expensive

name: Reginald Cook
text: I used to go there all the time till they started rasing the price of the gas and the food and drinks.its sad when u get a greedy ownership

name: shae tanniehill
text: We can

name: Walt Gay
text: Convenient

name: Bruce Smith
text: Fast in and out service

name: Austin Sandow
text: Prices are decent but the staff is rude, when asked why it is EVERY single time I’m in there I have to wait at the register 3-5 mins for a clerk to show up i was told they had more important stuff to do then wait at a register and their the only ones there.  I understand you have to stock and what not but here’s a idea when you here the bell go help the customer.

resp.text: Hi Austin, thank you for letting us know and we are sorry about your experience. We have passed on your message to our local management team.

text: Slowest damn pumps in the country! If you in a hurry, do NOT STOP here! Will literally take you 30+ minutes to fill an empty tank!!!

resp.text: Hi Christopher, thank you for letting us know and we are sorry about your experience. We have passed on your message to our local management team.

text: Bathrooms.closed to public ?!  You’ll take our money for gas but not provide a restroom?  No thank you.

resp.text: Hi Sherri, thank you for letting us know and we are sorry about your experience. We have passed on your message to our local management team.

name: Eric Martin
text: Always friendly and courteous service and the food is fantastic and not bad prices. Like all Convenience  stores other items are priced a bit high.

name: Alicia Guice
text: I only use Shell gas in my BMW

name: gpk1231
text: Great food and staff, one stop shop for everything !

name: Marty Cothran
text: Absolutely love the new owners, super nice family that you can tell cares about there customers and making sure everybody has a pleasant visit when you come in their store. If you haven't made it bye in the last month do your self a favor and go bye to see all the changes they have already put into the store to make it a much more friendly place and clean environment to shop!!! Keep doing what your doing it's making a big difference and people are noticing!!!!

name: Crystal
text: I use this store all the time and they are awesome, open 24/7 and always have an open kitchen for cooking delicious food. 🥰

name: Charles Ramsey
text: Friendly staff. And I found myself a bit short on money for what I came to get they excuse me let me go with my with my product, and then come to find out later they refunded the money I did pay them back to my debit card.

name: John Smith
text: The smell of the sewage is now gone due to the new owners actually cleaning up the place. Prices have actually went down on cigarettes instead of being ridiculously overpriced like before. The family that owns and operates the store now is much more friendly.

name: B Smith
text: The hard working family that has taken over are wonderful hard working folks store is a thousand times cleaner I’m in several times a day all I can say is thank god Mack and his way of doing business is gone !

name: Ashley Johnson
text: This store has made so many improvements. And very friendly. Great job!

name: lakyia
text: Because i live around the corner from here, this is my go to store when I'm in a hurry and haven't eaten anything

name: Ashley Sue Watson
text: Lady shorted me $30.00 aroind and about today. And i cannot get anyone on the store phone and dont know how to contact the owner of this place. To see if we couldnt get this issue taken care of. I do alot of buissness here and have never had an problem untill now. So i suggest everyone to double count ur money. The lady works 2 shift. It probly was an accident but it needs to be corrected. Not everyone has that kind of money to just take as a loss. And i am one of those people. So if so.eone could ease contact me i would greatly appriciate it. If not i will be in store early this morning before 10:00 am. Thank yoh

name: Andrew Ansley
text: I hate the boiled penats instead of tasting like nuts it task likes ass! 😖

name: Carlie McCain
text: Decent place to stop for gas, prices not the best but not outrageous! Be sure to lock up your vehicles!

name: Wendy Uhlman
text: Nice employees but long lines.

name: Ken Johnson
text: Sometimes this store is closed for about 20 or 30 minutes, and when the guy opens the store back up, the entire place smells like a huge turd.

name: M A
text: Good

name: Nicole Noble
text: I love peoples south bank ive been banking with them for years. Its awesome when i call they know me and can take care of me in mins the service is unlike any other bank ive been with.

name: Dan Wood
text: This Bank is amazing.

name: Calvin Dickerson
text: Great service great attitude fast pace and getting out the store

name: Zsaqui Jones
text: Good friendly staff

name: Ryan GUNSTRUCTION Hayward
text: It's a gas station what more to say !!

name: Niki Rugg
text: Employees SUCK

name: Christelia Powell
text: They hire people with bad attitude!! I ordered a thin crust meaty pizza and they made me original crust so when pizza was taken back to store the cashiers claimed I got my order wrong and not them. No refund no remaking my pizza on top of that when I called back to store she yelled at me the she didn't make any mistakes then hung up in my face twice!!!!! Do do jobs in customer service if you have a nasty attitude!!!! And I will be calling corporate.

name: Aaron Smith
text: They make fresh donuts right in the store, now as well as a full deli, pizza, and much more. They can customize orders for  you to fit any occasion, the place is always clean and staff is wonderful.

name: Benton Joel
text: Rude , unhelpful employees ever.  Specially a little short  black girl that works days. She is very rude.   Better get new employees.

name: Leslie Scott
text: Staff is always nice but the NEVER answer the phone when you call to order a pizza.

name: Kevin Barnette
text: The employees are always friendly and willing to help. The facility is really clean and its kept that way 24-7-365. Herndon Oil did a good job with the Southern Traders theme in all its stores. The only complaint I have ever had, is that they didn't enlarge the parking lot years ago, so it has a tendency at certain times to be crowded. Other than that it was and always is a pleasure to go to that store. I would reccomend it to anybody that ask. Also that have a Fuel Rewards program that automatically saves $.5 off of a gallon up to 20 gallons. After you spend so much money in the store you can get up to $.10 off a gallon. Add up the points and the savings goes up.

name: Christopher Saulsberry
text: Website says open 24 hours.Get there and closed

name: Celeste Gulledge
text: Called to order 3 or 4 pizzas...was put on hold for 15 min while one employee was waiting on everyone ...heard them say that they had someone quit today, then we were hung up on...management should have come in and helped run their store, poor management and business. No more pizza business from us. We will drive 15 min to Echo country store for our hunts bro pizza.

name: Aaron Smith
text: New products, new services, new hours, lots of food choices for on the go, catering, or eat in! Check them out! A lot of improvements over the past few months!!!

name: Catrina B
text: They never answer they phone!!!

name: Deputy Elkins
text: Friendly staff. Open 24hrs

name: Yolanda Taylor
text: Loved it.

name: Justin Schuette
text: Quick and convenient

name: Chad Hughes
text: Prices are a little high

name: Kevin Culver
text: Love it

name: Hava Lava
text: Always so helpful, and nice! I really appreciate them! Been with Regions for 10+ years. Can really count on them if and when I need help with something!

resp.text: Great customer service is what we strive for! We hope to see you again soon! -Ana

name: Robin Patrick
text: Q nice ladies and gentlemen's work at this place nice and kind and coin

name: alex diemert
text: Angela Grice was so awesome! She helped me with opening my account and I couldn’t be anymore happy!!!

name: Sue Phillips
text:
When at the drive through I am not even acknowledged when doing deposits.

text: Came to regions on Mon the Jan 11 the 2021. At 12. I needed to add my husband to my account that I just opened a few weeks ago. He took his lunch to get this done. As we walked it there was a lady in the first bankers office space talking up a storm with a couple of men in her cubical. We were attended quickly be a nice lady with short hair and glasses that was in the front main office. We forgot my husbands passport so we had to go back home and come back. We came back and the lady in the cubical was still having a conversation with the men about things that had nothing to do with banking. We came to sit once again and wait. The lady that attended us the first time with with another couple assisting them. She finished with them and the assisted another couple that must of been here earlier and came back with a stack of paper work and she helped them quickly. We still sat here waiting. It is exactly 1:35pm and we still have not been attended and the lady in the first cubical is still working with the old men that came to just open a simple account. (I could here there conversation) even as she asked for his information which was heard very well. (There is not much sound proofing). It’s been and hour and a half, she is still with the men. When I opened my account it took the lady but 20-30 at the most to get everything done. This is ridicules!! I worked at Wells Fargo bank in Jacksonville as a teller in 2015 and we never had a banker take that long with a costumer!! That banker needs a reality check. She is short with long black hair. 😡😡😡 1:42pm and she still not done!! Seriously!!

We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. We have forwarded your concerns to the appropriate channel. -Trish

text: I can't say enough about this bank. I recommend them to everyone. We were with another bank for years and the first sign of fraudulent charges on my account they refused to do anything about it. After losing close to $2000 we closed our account and went looking for a new bank. WF had the best hours and with a family of 6  and a husband on the road alot, this was very  important. I opened my account with the bank manager. He treated me very well. I opened my account one week and the next week when I went back in to deposit a check, I was greeted by name and even asked about how work was going. In the 7+ I was with my previous bank, noone addressed me by name, more or less asked me about anything personal. It was a nice change. We've been here over 4 years now and I've had zero issue with them. I'll never use another bank.

name: Debbie Freeman
text: The Western Union representatives are rude and condescending. On October 26, 2019, I attempted to send $600 to a friend I've known for 10 years in Uganda. She needed some money quickly for a medical procedure. I was told my reason sounded "highly suspicious." I was then reprimanded for sending money in this manner. The manager acknowledged it was common practice for people to illegally send money while shopping for groceries at Walmart. I was humiliated and will share this unpleasant experience with anyone I can.

name: Ron O'Neill
text: Excellent service, and always very helpful!!!

name: Dick Linley
text:
Have often noticed the Woodforest location at Walmart and their hours of operation seemed appealing.  Stopped by and picked up a pamphlet and briefly spoke with an extremely personable young lady, Amber Boroughs.
Researched bank online, along with this particular location and was somewhat bewildered by the negative views posted locally regarding customer service.

Decided to open a 2nd checking account at this facility to actually test performance against my current bank.  Upon my return, Ms.Boroughs efficiently and professionally assisted with the opening of the account.

Thus far I have been quite impressed with Woodforest, debit card transactions and a couple of deposits have performed flawlessly. I really like the almost instant notification of debit card and account activity.  One can choose to be notified even on days when there is zero account activity.

Still assessing the overall performance of the bank prior to totally committing.  But the customer service at the Olive St location has been great.  No waiting in line, my current bank is very similar to visiting the post office, always a line.  The staff has been very courteous, with Ms. Boroughs deserving 5 stars for graciousness and professionalism.

Still grading Woodforest as a whole, but the local staff is top flight.

name: DeAndrea Thompson
text: Absolutely horrible customer service using the banks Western Union service. The woman had a bad attitude from the beginning of the transaction and halfway through the transaction refused to send the money with no explanation. I have never had a teller at a bank be so rude and unhelpful. I was able to go 5 minutes down the road to another Western Union and complete the transaction with zero issues. And the person there did it with a smile.

text: I love it here at the Olive st. Location. They are always so friendly and actually seem to care about what’s going on with my account and my needs. Also, the are extremely efficient. Yeah, you may be waiting in line for a hot minute, but that isn’t all on the workers. People can be very demanding and incompetent. You don’t know what’s going on up there at the counter. Keep up the good job guys!!

name: myFATlife “Vuh-jj” By: Virginia
text:
RACIAL DISCRIMINATION!!!!!!
The only reason they got one star was cause there isn't an option for 0. I visited this place today 4/12/2016 To pick up money from Western Union sent from my soon to be husband's brother. I waited until a women got up off the computer after standing there for approximately three minutes cause I rarely use Western Union and never have here before so I didn't know what to do.  I hand over my paper and Kimberly R. Stone looked over it she didn't even pull up the MTCN, she then asked me "What's this money for?" I said "traveling expenses, My fiance and I are going to visit his family and they're sending us the money from where he's from." SHE DIDN'T EVEN TOUCH THE MOUSE ON THE COMPUTER!!!!  Kimberly R. Stone claimed she couldn't process my transaction. When I asked "Why?" in confusions. She said she suspected Fraud when I asked why she said "Why can't your boyfriend pick it up?" ALTHOUGH IT WAS NONE OF HER BUSINESS SINCE IT WAS IN MY NAME AND I HAD A VALID DRIVERS ID. I told her,  "We had problems with walmart not accepting his passport as a valid id and we didn't want to have any problems since its coming from so far away."  Kimberly R. Stone NEVER TOLD ME WHY SHE THOUGHT IS WAS FRAUD and unethically racially discriminated THIS because she seen it was coming from Saudi Arabia from a guy named Osama( It's the third most popular name for men from 20-56 years old) and rudely embarrassed me in front of another employee and customer. She then made the situation worse by making a sour look on her face and the tone in her voice was VERY hateful My friend's said they heard her gossiping to that employee and the customer after I left, so loudly she could hear and she was going through the checkout isle in front of the bank . She didn't even pull it up on the computer. I just can't believe they wouldn't train their employee's ESPECIALLY one in management about RACIAL DISCRIMINATION. Absolutely astounds me how racism still thrives in the south, you would expect someone in management to put aside their PERSONAL opinions on a situation and DO THEIR JOB PROFESSIONALLY. WHY do you guy's lie on your website about your employee's being professional or giving the highest level of customer service.. Isn't this your motto? " Woodforest Commitment Woodforest is a community bank built upon the needs of the customers we serve. We are committed to earning customer loyalty by offering the highest level of customer service as well as competitive products and services by employees who are fair, responsive, and professional. "

name: Damien Hires
text: The credit union was hacked on December 6, 2018, I was contacted that “my” debit card was flagged for fraud alert. Was informed by a representative for the Calvert, AL Brach that I would receive a card 10 days from December 6, 2018. It is now December 19, 2018. Still no debit card. I began calling the credit union on December 11th. Was informed my card has been shipped, I’ve called every day since, only to be on hold long periods of time never get a callback. So I keep calling only to be told sorry for the delay all our members had to get new cards and we are just protecting your account and I appreciate that. I don’t have credit cards all I have is a debit card. called the following day because I still have no card was told we can expedite you a card for $40 but that still not overnight shipping. I am slated to board a flight December 22, 2018, for a trip I’ve planned all year for Christmas I can not pay for a hotel room, checked back or my Broadway show with a check or cash. I know and feel I am not being valued or treated as a priority as a customer or member of this credit union for the error(s). I wasn't even given the option to have a new card expedited with fees waived due to my inconvenience. This credit union sucks I wouldn’t recommend them to the hackers who started this mess, yet alone Satan Himself.

name: Lloyd Weaver
text: I have been using this bank for over two years I got the 500 dollar overdraft since me and my wife got are first apartment we had nothing and had to keep using the overdraft pretty often there is a 30 dollar overdraft fee for anything over 1 dollar over witch is fine with me. How ever out of the blue they tuck the overdraft away and told me I have done to many over drafts and I could over use the over draft again in 30 days. OK fine after 30 days I got in a tight spot due to covid19 Palmer Toyota said we could only work every other day to lower the risk of getting covid but I still needed food and gas and rent even if they didn't charge a late fee it still had to be paid but can't overdraft.so after the 30 days the overdraft still is not working they said oh well it's going to be 60 days not 30 nope after 60 days still no overdraft once again I ask them why then I was told oh it's going to be 90 days for a cool down nope still no overdraft so once again I asked why no overdraft and was told oh it's has to have a full 6 months for its cool down. OK FINE! well even after that still no overdraft so again them why and they say I have to resign up for overdraft then it will finally work after 24 hours. Well still no overdraft after 6 days so again I go and ask why no overdraft and now they are telling me I can never have overdraft there again due to how many overdrafts I have made like a year ago. Like I said I needed over draft due to moving in are first apartment we needed everything so yes I used overdraft often they ALWAYS got there 30 dollar overdraft fee and the were always paid back and had a positive balance the following week we just had are first child so it would really be nice to know if I need to use overdraft I could but no giving them 30 dollars is not good enough for this joke of a bank. And also at the time I started a new job at Toyota as a tech so I needed overdraft to help get tools I did not have new apartment first child new job but now no overdraft with no warning and nobody knew at that bank why all I was told was next month next month them clown don't know anything.

My family member & I walked past bank table that had brochures & business cards out. A gentleman came out of office & clearly bank was closed up, so I told him it’s ok, we will come back when they open tomorrow. Here comes Ms. Nadia & another lady coming out from back  & to my surprise she took the initiative to say “don’t worry I’ll stay to help you both.”
15 minutes after they close & 10 minutes later(or more) we both signed up. ThankYou again for the Excellent customer service.

name: M J
text:
I highly recommend avoiding this particular Shell location at 2890 Acton Road based on my recent experience with them.

On what will most definitely be my final visit, I selected the 87 grade gas (as I've done every time I've purchased gas over the last 25 years), and proceeded to fill my tank up.

Once my tank was full, I glanced up and noticed a total amount that caught me off guard. I was later reviewing my receipt, and noticed that the pump had somehow charged me for the premium gas that was positioned on the opposite side of the pump (and was exactly $1 more per gallon).

I immediately drove back to this gas station to share my experience with the attendant. In the end, he told me there was nothing he could do about it.

The total cost difference between the grade of gas I chose and what I was charged for came out to around $14.50 for a single fill-up. Needless to say, that isn't sitting well with me, and I'd like to issue a warning to others with hope that it prevents someone else from having a similar terrible experience with this business.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Nathan. We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your experiences. We take protecting your accounts very seriously. When notified of potential fraud on your debit card, the only way we can prevent future fraud occurrences is to close the card and order you a new one. With our MyCardRules App, you can take full control of your debit card which includes locking and unlocking it for purchases. Visit our website at peoplesbankal.com to learn more. If you have additional questions or need additional assistance, please feel free to contact our customer support team. They are available M-F 7:30 am to 5:30 pm and on Saturday from 8:00 am to 1:00 pm.

text: I don't have a problem with the bank itself however the website is horrible. You cannot track down detailed account information like you can at other banks. They switched from Visa debit cards to Discover and it's been nothing but a headache for my family because many businesses and companies do not accept the Discover card. I unfortunately am looking into changing banks in the near future. Again I stress that it's not the bank or employees it's the extremely lackluster website and near useless debit card.

resp.text: Thanks so much for sharing your experience with us. We want you to feel comfortable sharing good or bad news with us. We are so sorry that your experience with us fell short of expectations. Feedback like yours led us to completely redo our website with a focus on improving user experience. Should you have additional comments or need assistance, please contact our customer support team at 877-788-0288. Thank you!

Which according to realitives with extensive time in banking said it could only been done if I was on the loan which I wasn't. Finally after much back and forth between the parties involved they admitted they wasn't authorized or supposed to draft that money. To which they finally reversed the transaction but didn't reverse the entire amount. They kept 2 dollars for some reason. If you get a loan here or a relative does be prepared for some shady business practices.

name: Justin Baker
text: Going to this bank is such a nightmare. When we pulled up yesterday there were three workers outside of the building laughing it up and talking while there was a line forming inside. This branch is bigger, but save yourself the trouble and go to the one in Collinsville. You won't be at that one for over an hour for no reason other than incompetence. When I tried to close my account, the lady could not be bothered to help me and dismissed me.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Justin. We sincerely apologize for your frustrating experience and would love an opportunity to make things right! We would be more than happy to assist with closing your account virtually! Please send us an email requesting to close the account along with a copy of your drivers license to marketing@winsouthcu.com. We truly appreciate your business and sincerely hope we have another opportunity to serve you in the future.

name: Kaitlyn Gardiner
text: This bank doesn’t deserve any stars honestly I went to the back last Friday to pull out 150 dollars out of my savings and the teller in the drive threw only gave me 50 like you guys need to learn to count and of course I didn’t realize it until I got home bc the teller wrote 150 on the envelope for me bc I also withdrew other money I am not happy

resp.text: We are so sorry this happened, Kaitlyn! We understand how frustrating this is and we truly apologize for the mistake. Tellers are required to balance their drawers daily and all outages are reported so please call the Fort Payne office to let them know what happened. We are honored by your choice to do business with WinSouth CU and sincerely hope to have the opportunity to make things right. Thank you, Kaitlyn!

name: JT Takanashi
text: I took a loan out for $1000 when I was a teenager. I thought I paid it off. 6 years later I have the cops knocking at my door to serve me papers. Turns out I still owed $80 to them. Ok no big deal I'll go ahead and pay for it that's my bad. Until they turn it into there lawyers and now I owe $1200 from late fees and court cost.  I never received a call, email, text,or letter in the mail. Absolutely nothing. Thieving disgrace. (Update) I ain't  emailing yall nothing! I've already paid it and it's been satisfied with the lawyers and the court. Unless yall gonna give me my money back. Dont say nothing.

resp.text: Hello JT, We're very sorry for your frustrating experience and we'd like to know more about what happened. Unfortunately, we're unable to find an account, open or closed, in our system that matches your name. Will you please email us at marketing@winsouthcu.com, with your account details and contact information, so we can contact you directly to discuss further? Thank you, JT!

text: We had been with redstone for 3 years,  after 3 years of perfect payments and had 2 semis paid for and needed a $3000 loan and use one of our semis as collateral they said no even though we have good credit scores excellent payment history they said no and a few months later we went to traditions Bank and they gave us a $55,000 commercial loan and we bought a 07 peterbilt and still have made payments on time.  If anyone is having trouble getting a loan and you have made current payments consecutively go to traditions bank and they will help.  When you call there is no automated person its a real person.  It is worth the drive for a bank who invests in people who are trying unlike some banks.

name: Jan LibertyJustice
text: Myself and many people I know have had really bad experiences with this particular bank at this particular location. We have had problems with our accounts not correctly showing the right amount of money in their computers. Then when we try to talk to someone about it we are told the computer never makes mistakes. So we point out that a person has to put numbers into the computer and no person is perfect and we offer to show them our records. They agree to look at them but the manager NEVER will meet with us. No matter how many times we go ,no matter how long we wait, it goes on and on. She is always too busy to see us if the bank owes us money.  That is Regions I know so many people who are thinking of leaving or have left. I left because of this branch's  manager and Region's policies about 4 years ago and gave up and lost money when I withdrew all my money. I recently found out that a close friend of mine is going through almost the same complaint with the exact same branch manager at this Regions branch whom she's been trying to talk to for a long time!!  She's short a lot of money in her account too. The assistant manager seemed very nice and wanted to help but he says only the branch manager has the power to handle such matters and he would tell me when to come to see her. But she wouldn't see me even after many months of coming in to see her!! I tried to complain to Regions Bank but I was told the decision must be made by the branch manager where I opened my account. If Possible I would give this branch and Regions Bank 0 Stars.

name: Joseph Latham
text:
Don't go here. The owner and the workers are extremely rude and very unhelpful. I needed a receipt from yesterday and he couldn't find my specific transaction. So he printed me off the wrong receipt for the wrong transaction, and I come back today to try and correct the situation. I try to be as polite as humanly possible, cause I understand service industry can be trying sometimes. But they say they can't pull up any transactions from the day before.

I ask the manager, is there anyway, and he says he can't do it with a smirk on his face. I asked him if I had wronged him anyway, and he says no. But still with a attitude that I feel I didn't deserve.

Then, turns out the gas and food I had gotten from here was all expired. Very poor service, very poor attitudes, and completely unhelpful. Save yourself the trouble and avoid this place like it was the plague.

text:
I would of gave it 5 stars but the gas prices here fluctuate way to much,
but I still end up getting gas here when my gas light is on, in fear of running out of gas before the next gas station lol. You can drive 2-3 miles each way and find better gas prices per gallon. Besides that, it’s a great store that stays open 24/7 and the new owners seemed very nice, but I wish they would get some bread to sell lol for all of the times I go there late at night needing bread or a 20oz Grapico’s they might not have. Besides all of that, my rating may change as the new owners learn and grow more. I’ll be on the lookout for the bread and the 20oz Grapicos lol

name: T Carroll
text: Most expensive place for gas in town.  The owners are very very rude!

resp.text:
Hi Tony,

Retail gas prices are a reflection of the current function of supply and demand and are ultimately set by the individual retail sites, which are independently owned and operated. Many factors contribute to gas prices, which the Energy Information Administration discusses at the following page: http://www.eia.gov/energyexplained/index.cfm?page=gasoline_factors_affecting_prices

We are sorry to hear about your experience with the owners. We will pass this along to the Consumer Relations team, who will notify the owner of your experience.

Thanks,
BP

name: Johnathan Heard
text:
I noticed I was out of gas so I pulled in.  I then realized that I had left my billfold and I also did not have any spare cash in my console.  I was parked in front of gas pump at 3am.  I then was told by Jessica an employee that I couldnt be blocking her pumps and costing them business I told her what was going on and asked would it be ok to pull in a parking space.  She said u have been since I came on. I responded I know I dont want to go far cause I will run out I am trying to call a friend.  Officer Bivens said I was fine.
Then 3 hours later the Pepsi man was trying to get in to the store and his load fell over. I then helped him pick it all up and he got in the door.  Later on he came out and asked if I was out of gas or could he help.  He put in 10.00 for me.  Jason is his name and I appreciate that.   I had then already contacted my brother who was on the way also.   But the treatment I received from this employee really hurts the kind spirit of mankind.  Instead of asking what was gojng on and listening to what I was doing she immediately was on the defensive with you got to move. You are blocking my gas pumps costing me business.  It was 3 am.  I was the only one out there with my dog.  On the phone trying to get some money.   I only lived 20 miles away but I was on empty and I will always check before I leave the house and I will always have cash in the car.  I will never stop agajn at this station I will just run out of gas.

name: Stephanie Howard
text: I would rate ZERO!! Do not go there. Bought gas there and mile up road truck broke down. We called station lady tells us their gas is fine and hangs up on us! Tow company told us we are the third person this week that bought gas from there and vehicle had to be towed. DO NOT GET GAS THERE!

name: Joyce Shelley
text: Terrible! Gas is .40 more than the other Marathon Stations and their bathrooms are closed! Will never stop here again!

name: Sydney
text: Bathrooms could use work but this gas station has a gorgeous view outside and a bench you can sit at, perfect for a rest stop on road trips. Staff is usually nice and sociable!

name: Jodie McKinley
text: When I opened my checking and savings accounts, they were supposed to be linked so if in the event of an checking account overdraft, I would be only be charged a $5.00 fee to transfer needed funds. This did not happen and when I neglected to transfer funds from my savings to my checking before dropping $$$ at the DMV to renew our tags and purchase a new car tag and do some grocery shopping, I was charged $300 in OD fees even though I had adequate funds in my savings account to cover the transactions. This was all on ACU! It took three phone calls, two emails, and several weeks to get their mess straightened out because they "needed to verify that they actually made a mistake" and that it was not my fault the accounts were not initially linked. I was also told that they *may* not reimburse all the fees I was charged even though THEY made the error. Eventually I was reimbursed but while they took their time, I was out the funds they took from my account for over two weeks!

resp.text: We’re sorry you had to deal with that inconvenience, Jodie. We will look into this process and see what we can do to improve it moving forward.

name: Anthony S
text:
Does not recommend. This isnt the little down home place it once was. As they’ve grown, they have become more like the big corporate banks i tried to stay away from. I have 2 car loans and checking/ savings with them. When i get back in town I’m looking transfer these account to, pretty much anywhere else.  In my experience, when inquiring about anything such as a loan, you dont talk with someone face to face. Filling out the paperwork online, you talk to someone over the phone who just happens to be in Alabama. And they do like to take their tome about it. Which was one of the reasons I didnt go with some out of state or online company; although in retrospect I’ve had better experiences with them.
The killer for me was today, when they denied me deferring a payment due to my father passing last week and being out of town for that. Which probably wouldn't bother me quite as bad (it was due prior to my request), but Avadian literally sent me an email 3 weeks ago telling me i could skip my August payment for the fun of it (See below)
“You may be planning to spend the money on a trip, to make a surprise purchase, throw a birthday party, or just to build your savings, just send in the coupon by August 15, 2020. (Note: There is a $40 processing fee to skip your payment“

resp.text: We’re sorry to hear you’ve had a bad experience with us, Anthony. Could we have someone reach out to you and discuss this? If you would be so kind as to send us a private message with the best number and time, we’d like to get in touch.

name: Robin Murray
text:
I’ve always preferred Credit Unions over big banks because they take the time to get to know their customers . Ive never had to worry about any problems too with anyone getting into my account or copying my card - these folks at Avadian catch problems before you , the consumer ever know what’s going on . And , if there’s anything remotely suspicious with your account , they will call you to verify purchases before they okay them .

I’m so happy to be banking with the fine folks at Avadian Credit Union , formerly known as Alabama Telco Credit Union !!!

Thank you to each and every one of you that work so hard to keep our money safe . You are very important to me and I think you all do a much better job than any bank I’ve ever been with .

Robin Murray

name: Ricky Duncan
text: Slime

resp.text: Ricky, we hate to hear that you’ve had a bad experience. It’s difficult for us to improve if you don’t give us any further detail.

name: Mrs.
text: I have been with the bank owning just a savings account for almost 9 years. But I must say my experience today was deplorable!! The level of customer service I got today was as if this company was established in the ghetto. I was trying to get a fee of $30 removed from my savings account that a payment from my school loan for only $10 was rejected. I was passed to 5 different people all the way to the Trussville branch when I originally established my account at the Colonnade location. One of the ghetto women that I spoke to got extremely rude with me and hung the phone up in my face. First of all I never signed anything stating I agreed to overdraft fees on a savings account and 2nd of all why would you charge me $30 for a $10 rejected fee?? No one explained this to me in the whole almost 9 years that I have had this worthless account. I said to heck with it Im just going to close it...but noo not because of the $30 fee, but because of the level of customer service I got. I would not recommend this bank for savings or checking for that matter., They may be well on loans I do believe that. But I have gone ahead and changed all my deposits I have going into this account so that I can close it IMMEDIATELY!!! They are out of compliance and have predatory fees. Thanks AVADIAN. But your services will NEVER be needed again from me. Good Riddance.

Most of the time the pizza are fine, first time trying the loaded, won't make that mistake again.

text: We come here a lot. But now, I am done. It's happened a couple other times, but never this bad. It's Sunday afternoon. There are two ladies already at the chicken counter. Waiting. I come up and the girl cooking completely ignores us.i can see her in the back. Cooking. The girl working the register yells at the deli lady. She screams back, yes, screams,that she is dropping chicken, that she can't sell it if it's not cooked. VERY UNPROFESSIONAL. I work in retail. You do NOT do that to customers. All she had to do was let us know, and that would have been it . Just say, " I am dropping chicken. I will be there as soon as I can "  But, no. She has to scream. So...

name: Josh Taylor
text: I don’t normally complain about local businesses but I’ve about had enough of being nickel and dimed from Avadian Credit Union. My wife and I both have separate accounts with them and have had mortgages and car loans. We sold our house and moved last April and unbeknownst to us have been getting charged an incorrect address fee every month ever since. Strange thing is that the new house that we built was financed through Avadian as well so they obviously have our current address. We rarely use that account as a primary checking so it went unnoticed this entire time.  This is not the first time we have gotten these types of fees as well as inactivity fees from Avadian. Just posting this so that other folks can hopefully avoid similar situations with a credit union that does business in this fashion.

resp.text: We are sorry you feel this way Josh. It’s important for us to have a current address on file so that we do not send important information to an address where someone else currently resides. Have you gotten the current address added to the account? We would like to make sure this is resolved.

The funny thing is if you call the 1-800# for America’s  First with SAME question, they are happy to give you information and so polite. Now I never have to deal with the rude leeds branch people every again! :)

name: LEGION 4wermany
text: I went to my bank to make a simple deposit into my checking account. As I've always done I have money transferred from my checking to other accounts to pay bills and etc. I was informed by an untrained teller that I wouldn't be unable to do my bank transactions unless I had the exact amounts including change memorized, of each loan and credit card amounts which were several. the untrained teller had to get up at every question I had, and go back to the branch manager to ask for advice this happened six times and the branch manager still didn't come out to take control or help with the situation. I ended up having to leave without my bills being paid because of their incompetence I have zero faith in the abilities of America's first credit Union. the staff was rude and incompetent including the branch manager something needs to be done to make a change here or I will be taking our business elsewhere my advice to whoever reads this review is don't come here! P. S. The turnover rate here is off the charts.

name: Koleton Kelley
text: I just attempted to go through the drive Thru lane only one teller taking so long to do each transaction. I wanted for over 10 min and she still wasn’t done with one customer. This needs to get better. Or I am switching to somewhere that can actually get things done in a timely manor.

text: This is a good credit union but they are so busy it is very difficult to get service.  Their rates are not quite as good as Heritage South down the street and you can get faster, more personalized service down the street too.  I have a mortgage here but have moved my checking.  Will continue to migrate my business.

name: Lynn Cleghorn
text: Typically I have no complaints with our bank. Been with them for many years . But what really gets on my nerves is each teller has their own set of rules for your account.   I have deposited personal checks for $20-100. And most of the time iitis not an issue with the bank. But in the last year 1 will say they have to put it on a 10 day hold, new guidelines.  Then the next time I'm expecting it again and they say no we dont have to do a hold. It irritates the crap.out of me. So what you have a bad day so you make the rules up as you go?

name: David Key
text: This LEEDS, AL branch is the best one so far. The staff is courteous and friendly and is knowledgeable. Other branches I have visited had nice staff as well but this is my go to place.

name: Spencer Webb
text: Called up there this morning and instead of answering the phone, the representative present hung up on me, when it’s my money on the line you don’t hang up on people

name: Nick Nunnelley
text: My wife and I went to americas first because of all their advertising on auto loans and how great they are, we were approved in minutes for a loan of 8000 dollars with a low interest of %5.....GREAT!!! we drive to GEORGIA from BIRMINGHAM to get the car and it wasn't as expected. So, we look around while there and find a NEWER car with LESS miles. Call americas first back, great no problem, even lower monthly payments than first anticipated, GREAT DEAL. DRIVE BACK TO THE CARLOT AND SPEND THE NIGHT IN GEORGIA.  We get the car lot to run the papers, fax them to americas first where we have ALREADY BEEN APPROVED, DRIVE BACK TO ANNISTON (the closest americas first) after spending the night in georgia, make it all the way there and they tell us &quot;OOPS, our mistake, we cant finance it for what we already approved you, only DOUBLE THE PAYMENTS with more money down.&quot; after we tell them the situation and complain, the best answer we get is &quot;sorry wish we could help&quot; sad thing is i was so impressed with all their grand ads and commercials i was about to change all of my banking over to them. when i went back in and talked to the branch manager she was extremely defensive, and seemed more concerned with blaming my wife and myself than admitting that they miscommunicated. the worse thing is it was the actual branch manager who pre-approved us and even went as far as telling us exactly what to get the dealer to fax them so they could finalize the loan and "have a check waiting." Glad they showed their true colors and only wasted 300 DOLLARS of our money before i made that mistake!!!

resp.text: We're sorry to hear about the account situation. If our team can further assist you with anything, please email us at askRegions@regions.com. -Ana

name: Sierra King
text: Haven’t ever had to deal with the pell city branch, I usually contact leeds or the one on 280 and they provide EXCEPTIONAL service and try and rectify all issues. The pell city location is awful. The assistant manager is horrifically rude. I called about THREE overdraft fees coming out of my account for ONE thing that overdrafted overnight before I got a chance to deposit cash. I called to find out why it took 3 out, totaling over $100. As soon as I said I had a question her response was “well I don’t understand what you want me to do I can see the same things as you can”. She continued to tell me my banking app was incorrect and I did not have money in my account and multiple pending transactions that “I could see” I have NEVER had issues seeing pending transactions or even with the money not coming out of my bank immediately for a “pending” transaction. She then told me the only accurate way to monitor how much money I have is to keep an “old fashioned check book”. I asked her again why I got charged THREE overdraft fees and she went through my account telling me all of the charges that still wouldn’t have led to me having three overdraft charges. She put me on hold 3 times in the middle of me talking and concluded the conversation by telling me she could only take one off, which I still haven’t seen the money back in my account, and that I would have to wait until her branch manager got back on Monday to resolve the issue and see if he could do anything for me at all, and that she would tell him I was “so distraught over the situation” in a super condescending tone. Absolutely disgraceful to handle business in this way in the middle of a pandemic where so many people are financially stretched. I wasn’t even fighting the first $36 charge, but the other two were absurd. Would not recommend this location, and it’s seriously making me reconsider banking with regions all together if this is how business will be conducted. I have been with them for 4 years and can understand mistakes when handled KINDLY and appropriately.

resp.text: Our apologies for the delay and your customer service experience. We appreciate you taking the time to share your concerns with us. We have forwarded your concerns to the appropriate channel. If you'd like to further discuss,  feel free to email us at askRegions@regions.com. -Trish

name: Hannah Gulledge
text: Drive through is ridiculous.

text: Cards constantly declining when I have the available balance to cover it, the chips constantly reads wrong so I have to swipe which defeats the purpose of a chip. Checks bounce when they shouldn't then theres the fact that regions is the most fee happy bank I've ever dealt with. Dont over draft by .10 cents I did one time and they charge me 36 bucks......make sure when u pay ur credit card that u leave the money in there cause I took out money and my account was 2 dollars shortstop my card payment was returned.....which they charged me 36 bucks for.....its crazy. I hate how this is the only majornon local bank here in pell city. We deserve better options only leaving 3 stars instead of 2 cause the ATM is super fancy, can cash/deposit checks, and deposit cash. Super nice ATM, When it works, just tried this mo re ning and it gave me a depositing error.

I would suggest waiving monthly fee for veterans, as Chase does.

text: Wonderful staff! Helped me on a couple of occasions and no wait time!

name: Wendy Tucker
text: The worst customer service. Not just today but time and time again. Asked for change, received the wrong change, got the correct amount but it was thrown into the drive through tube without an envelope. $100 in 5’s and $100 in loose $10 bills. I sent my deposit in an envelope with a note asking for what change I needed...they could have at least used the envelope I sent so that I didn’t have loose bills displayed for anyone to see. And maybe read the note to verify that you’re giving the correct bills that were requested.

name: Arielle Arielle
text: This is the worst Regions Bank. I have aways been a fan of Regions, but after coming here I contemplated leaving the bank altogether. The manager is rude and uppity, and the customer service from everyone else follows suite. I have come twice and got treated like I was a nobody both times. Regions should really restaff this location. Or close it. It ruins the good name of the bank itself.

resp.text: Hey, Arielle! Our team is sorry for any situations you may have come across. We would like to document these details fully. If we can speak to you, please send us an email to askRegions@regions.com. We're happy to call you. -Ana

Stayed on the phone line so long that I got an automated message about needing to call back later due to high call volume. Talking to my husband tonight about switching to Regions. A Southern Company with Southern values. Not rudeness, long lines, and maybe the ATM does what you.

text: I had to order currency for my study abroad. Everyone was really friendly, and I didn't need to open an account with Wells Fargo. I highly recommend coming here if you need to order a foreign currency for your trip, even if you aren't a member of Wells Fargo

resp.text: Hi, Joseph! We are thrilled to receive a 5-start rating from you! Thank you for taking the time to let us know of the level of member service we are providing to you. We value our relationship with you, and look forward to being your continued financial partner. PS, the LIVE machine are pretty awesome, aren't they?

name: Tarius Sledge
text: Amazing

name: Tori Applegate
text: I had an account get overdrawn. I missed the thirty day pay back mark by TWO DAYS. I didn't get a letter or anything of the sort. They didn't say it went to collections when I paid it off. The account never closed and stayed in "good standing". Got a ping that I had a new derogatory mark on my credit, a collection. I went up to the credit union as soon as I saw it and asked if anything could be done. They said no. So thanks for nothing at all. I will be closing my account ASAP and will recommend penair to no one. AL Credit Union is such a better choice and they forgive if you forget by a day or two to pay something. Not to mention they try to help you build your credit not ruin it.

name: Jennifer May
text:
I have been a member for over 10 years and a CSR at the Foley Alabama branch persuade my husband while banking there. He has left my 3 kids and I for said woman and the bank decided to handle it by terminating my membership and promoting her to managers position. Pen Air has no ethics or moral standing.
On its website, the credit union boils down its brand promise to this: “We promise to value and respect the trust you’ve placed in us.”
If only that were true...

name: Brandon Sylvester
text: I have been with this credit union for 12 years and they are always friendly and helpful.  Felisa Merryfield Helped me with my HELOC and a recreational loan.  She was fast and helped find the best loan to suit my situation.

text: It's like a family here. Great bank. Fantastic service. Best option around hands down. I'm so glad I switched from Regions.

resp.text: Ethan we're so glad you feel like family! We value our members and respect and value the trust you've placed in us. We couldn't be happier. Thank you for the 5Star Review, and thank you for being a Pen Air Member!

name: Good Citizen (Good Citizen)
text: Very pleased with the overall experience at this branch in general. I'm especially pleased with Rachael Hambric's service and professionalism. I have been a long time customer of Pen Air's, have obtained multiple loans and Rachael has been my POC in every single one. Great experience overall.

resp.text: Alain - Thank you for taking the time to leave us with a 5 Star Review and your special comments about Rachael Hambric's service and professionalism. Thank you for being a loyal member of Pen Air!

name: Gus Delafuente
text: Always get helped fast and proper.

name: Patrease Durgin
text: I had recently went to this credit union in Foley to apply for a loan so that I can get me another car because an old car that I have is about to break down on me. The people there that I talked who works there were nice, but I hate the policy of this credit union that one of them described to me which is for example: If you have filed for bankruptcy within the last 10 years and haven't established much credit and you've never gotten a loan and paid off that loan, then you won't be able to get a loan from them because obviously they feel that your'e probably not going to pay that loan back to them. So they aren't going to give you a chance. Well how can one get their foot in the door to get a loan from them and then pay it off??? I don't think that is fair at all!! Such a stupid policy!!

resp.text: Patrease - Thank you for reaching out to us and provide us your feedback. It is important that we understand the needs of our members and listen to their pain points. We would love the continue the conversation with you to better understand your situation and see how we can develop a solution to get your credit repaired. We are hear to help. Please feel free to reach out to us at memberservicecenter@penair.org. Thank you again for your feedback.

It is no longer personal or hometown , just cold call centers and crappy customer service over the phone. Really disappoints me since I trust them enough to keep my money.

resp.text: Shannon - Thank you for taking the time to write this review. It's important to us to hear back from our members on how we are doing. Now by the time I recieve an access code their web site is timed out. They think that no one will need to make a balance transfer for days at a time. They think everyone is psychic and can foretell the future. I wouldn't hire a Penair official to carry out my garbage , because I don't think they have the mental capacity to do the job.

name: Kandace Ballard
text:
I lost my Regions debit card about 4 days ago; after looking everywhere, I finally gave in to reporting it as lost/stolen. The website read that I'd receive it within 5-7 business days, which I was okay with, but my biggest concern was when I read that it was being mailed to an old address I had connected to the card; which is a very, VERY bad neighborhood. So around 11pm I called customer service, and they were able to cancel the request (thank God,) and stated I needed to go to my local Regions branch to change the address and request new, so I did.

The wait was a little longer than expected, but I'm not one to complain. I typically do not leave reviews, but the woman who assisted me, Roxie Kitchen, was phenomenal and deserves the recognition! She not only helped me update my address and request me a new card, but she also assisted me with setting up a savings account, and gave me several options to help me build up my credit score, since I am looking to purchase my (first) own vehicle by the end of the year and I currently have no credit.

We had some complications, but despite it all she kept a positive attitude and was very helpful, informative and sweet; it was just like talking to a friend. She welcomed every question I had and was able to give me a clear answer and explain in detail what everything was.

If you live in Troy, or just passing by in need of a visit, definitely stop by and talk to Mrs. Roxie. It was a great experience!

name: John Calvin
text:
Worst banking experience due to management.

I went to this particular Regions bank today simply to pay a bill.  When i got there cars were lined up by about 5-7 in each row so i decided to go inside. It took more than 30 minutes to get to the front to pay my bill.  They literally had one inside teller, and one outside teller, on Labor day weekend.   As i moved up the line i looked back and saw that the line stretched to the outside door and customers were getting impatient.  I assume this is the way the outside car lines were as well.

I can understand it being a busy day due to circumstances.  I can't understand they only having 2 total tellers (1 inside, and one outside teller) on a day such as this, other than poor management.

This was wrong for both the employees (whom i feel sorry for), and the customers.

At other Regions bank locations i have had a good experience.  This one i would rather never go back.

name: Mr Nasca
text:
NO STARS!!! WORSE BANK EVER!!!! STAY AWAY OR YOU'LL GET SCAMMED TOO
opened an account and less than a month later it  was closed for no reason other than a banker didn't do their damn job and now they've closed the account and refuse to give me my money!!! withholding $800 that isn't theirs. And have told me because the account was closed there's nothing they can do about it yet they closed it because one of their bankers didn't input the information they were given upon opening the account.
REGIONS IS A JOKE AND THESE TELLERS ARE HORRIBLE. They take your money, give you fees you arent suppose to have and they dont bother helping you at all, they constantly make excuses why they cant help you and then they all stand around talking instead of helping with actual issues. TERRIBLE BANK STAY AWAY

text: Non Account Holder but I handle four clients who use them as a primary banking institution, so I'm there... often. From a non account holders perspective... this branch is nice, not superb, nor bad. A hint above average: in reflection to: customer service, helpfulness, overall employee demeanor. 4/5

name: Jake Rasmussen
text:
The customer service at the branch is horrible. We opened an account in July of 2016 and every time we ask a question of a banker we get a different answer.

It appears the bankers make up the answers they desire to have. Training is horrible Regions wide.

Sometimes they charge fees, sometimes they cash checks, sometimes they close their branch 5 minutes early because what you come in for will take longer than 5 minutes.

The service at this branch is really bad.

If you are needing a new bank, please think about using a better bank than Regions.

name: Vincent Tan
text:
I went at 2:00.
Hours say open until 5.
Drive through was closed.
Inside is open only by appointment but I see all the staff leaving.
So the only option at this location is the ATM.
Passed by again at 3 and all the cars were gone so they really close at 2.
Who closes at 2 on a weekday??...

Edit: Turns out closing at 2 on Friday is a normal thing for Regions.

Update your hours and I’ll remove this comment if I remember.

name: Cam Ferguson
text: This is for Regions in general.  Literally the worst customer service in the banking industry, poor attitudes, unwillingness to help (specifically during the pandemic).  I have been with them for 10+ years but will be pulling my accounts out of this garbage company at my first opportunity.

resp.text: We don't want you to leave us, Cam. If Our team can assist you, please feel free to send us your phone number in an email to askRegions@regions.com. We are happy to chat with you. -Ana

America's Home Place
Wayne Boyette
General Manager

name: David Wilkinson
text: This happened on 11/26/18 at 2:00pm. I am Caucasian and have a handicapped tag. I’m sure this is racially motivated considering the recent events at the Galleria mall but I was offended. I pulled into a handicap parking space and the guard immediately came out and looked at my tag. Once I finished my business I moved my car and watched. When people of color parked there he did not check their tags. Not once !! I’ve been with this Credit Union for 40 years and do not appreciate being singled out because of my race and recent events. Do not let this happen again or I will take my business elsewhere.

text: This bank has gone downhill since the last five years. They have terrible customer service and tellers! Fraud department is terrible they uses 3rd party vendor which is bad! Changing banks soon!

text: Deposited my money Friday my whole pay check tried pay insurance Saturday declined my card went to bank Monday and they said lady forgot to deposit it. Was broke all weekend and needed my money and couldn’t get it until Monday. Well off to work Tuesday far from home no money in pocket tried buy me food and card declined. After over 800 is in my account. This bank has issue and I’m not deal with it anymore. Now I have to leave work again and go down there and close my account and go to a different bank. Not right for my money not to be there when I put it in there and my card saying declined when money is in there.

name: Mick McMeme
text: Not a good place for a long term savings account. A savings account is a place where your money can be kept safely, if they see no money added or withdrawn over a couple of months, they start charging a "fee" until the account is drained dry. The whole point of the account is to keep my money safe there. This should serve as an indicator to the type of bank this is.

name: Alden Brindle
text: Good to work with. I like that they are insured by the government. Some credit unions hove a non government insurance.

name: Davis Family 5
text: So far I am not very impressed with this credit union. I am not sure if it is just the person that we dealt with or the entire credit union.  We made an appointment to do an auto loan and it felt like the initial person that helped us at the Clanton branch talked down to us the entire time. We had to leave and get some additional documentation, which was fine, but we were not given all of the information that we needed. I had called to double check to see what we needed and so it was ready when we came back to the branch.  When we came back to the branch a couple of days later I was told that we did not have everything that we needed. On top of that, the person that was supposed to be helping was not even in the branch that day and she had passed everything off to another employee.  I understand that sometimes you can't be at work but the reason for her absence was apparently planned weeks in advance. She had made an appointment with us and we expected to meet with her since she knew the entire scenario.  We did get the loan done, and I am very appreciative of that and the employee that helped us the second time, but it was much harder than it had to be! Once we were done with the loan we, again, did not get all the information that should have been passed to us. We were informed that insurance was going to be force placed on the loan if we did not provide proof of insurance.  We got insurance on the vehicle BEFORE we even went to finalize the loan. If the proper questions were asked at the time of closing by the lender then this all could have been avoided. I hope our future encounters with this credit union are better.

name: Robert Price
text: Great employees and helped me with everything I needed.

name: Randall Phillips
text:
Personnel are always very helpful and share a smile.

I don't have other accounts there but since then I have gone in for a couple of things and the people have been helpful (that's why I'm giving 2 stars). Hopefully my experience was isolated and they fired the person who screwed up my account.

Today we were moving our Hyundai store from it's Florence location to Tuscumbia and around lunch time one of the guys said, "Let's go to Shell for a burger", confused I responded "is that a new restaurant?"

Surprise surprise, they took the time to make burgers fresh for all four of us, two burgers a piece, and they actually were... pretty darn good!

Who knew you could fill up the gas tank and have a homemade burger to boot!

When a business takes this kind of action to gouge customers, I no longer consider them a part of a local community.

Again, almost three months later and I still can't get them to DO THEIR JOBS......

resp.text:
Mr. Oros, we sent your title on 6/18. You paid it off on 6/3. You didn’t let us know you had not received it until
yesterday. We prepared the title and mailed it again this morning. You should have it shortly.

text: They often do maintenance on their system, I assume..and this has inconvenienced me so much until I am ready to switch credit unions because I could be stranded needing gas or anything and between midnight and 1:30am, I cannot make any transactions...not even a balance inquiry. This has happened several times and I had to rely on my daughters money and pay them back after everything clears. I'm standing there with a basket full of groceries and my card declines. How embarrassing...and you're trying to tell the cashier that you have money in the bank and they are looking at you like, "honey you knew you didn't have money in the bank before you came in here. We've all heard that one before." I could just read their minds...how humiliating. Then an hour later, the card is working again! I'm in search of a new credit union. I have had enough of SRFCU's shenanigans!

text:

They do not stock enough of the items that are bought the most (2liter twist-up & Pall Malls are two such idems)
The restrooms seem to have dry residues on the toilet seats.
Everyone from the management to the homeless smoke around the Coke machine and Propane Gas Tanks.
Last minute drinks are by the door and away from the registers.

All due to THEIR negligence. I will be in there first thing Monday morning and expect some compensation for this issue. I now have three late fees from my bills due to this banks error. If they cant compensate my late fees then I will be Seeking legal help for this matter. I should not have to pay three separate companies more money ( that I do not have) because of late fees due to my bank not putting MY money in MY account.

My family and I came into Wells Fargo to open four new accounts on the 21st (yesterday). While sitting for a few minutes, Jill King (also greeted us when we walked in) came to get us to see what she could do for us. She got us settled in, asked a few questions then proofs. She spoke in such an upmannering, professional way. She was personal, humorous, so sweet, kind and enjoyed helping us. She answered any question, she laughed with us. She made this experience everything that it is. She cared about our time. Knew we all had a long day and wanted to help us get finished and all set up. HONESTLY, Jill K is the best employee I have seen working in Auburn, AL in over 5 years. She is the most incredible woman that could have been there yesterday. Absolutely awesome. I’ll never forget this experience. I’m moving soon and she left Auburn AL a great place in my mind!
If you ever read this Jill, thank you once again. I’ll recommend you to everyone I know.

text:
Social security administration freezes debit cards and accounts during global pandemics. I admit I'm late on just one of my many accounts in good standing with them. Two of them teenage boys who are out of school until further notice.  SSCU has normally been good for business but this is bad, insensitive, and nonresponsive to the COVID response I thought businesses were taking at this time to help families. I'll be seeking to bank elsewhere once I've paid off all my accounts. Please dont bank here if you can help it. Convenient but not compassionate at all to say the least. Congratulations!
